Title: Allows first responders who are diagnosed with post-traumatic stress disorder to request line of duty sick leave
Summary: Allows first responders who are diagnosed with post-traumatic stress disorder to request line of duty sick leave.
LawCode: Add ยง92-e, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to allowing first responders who are diagnosed with post-traumatic stress disorder to request line of duty sick leave
